63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:Originally, two rak`at were prescribed in every prayer. When the Prophet (ﷺ) migrated (to Medina) four rak`at were enjoined, while the journey prayer remained unchanged(i.e. two rak`at)

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّارِيخِ مِنْ أَيْنَ أَرَّخُوا التَّارِيخَ
chapter.eng-name: When did the Muslim calendar start?
